mapper.select: select video_id,video_title,video_path,create_time,association_name from video v join association a on v.association_id = a.association_id order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert video (video_title, video_path, video_description, association_id, user_id) values (#{videoTitle}, #{videoPath}, #{videoDescription}, #{associationId}, #{userId})
